features: What is a Notion template? A Notion template is a pre-designed structure within the Notion app that serves as a starting point for creating your pages and databases.; Can I customize Notion templates? Absolutely! Notion templates are highly customizable. You can change colors, fonts, layouts, and content to match your style or project requirements.; Have questions about the template?
